name: One Night at Flappy's
description: Hello Person-Who-Will-Remain-Unnamed-For-The-Sake-Of-Immersion, I’m Flappy, and welcome to my dwelling! I brought you here because I think you would be a great fit for my assignment, but I need to test you first. You will need to survive for 6 hours while managing your power and my friends. If you think this premise sounds familiar, no it doesn’t! So, get familiar with the cameras, learn what my friends do, and I’ll see you soon!
